description.fr:
{%FightTurnEndedMonsters}\v
Invoque un\_monstre.\vEn invoque un supplémentaire par tour de jeu.
<rem>Limité à {value:m} monstres maximum.</rem>
\---
Puis {PMvalue:pm,+} aux monstres qui ont {ATvalue:seuil} ou plus, n'affecte pas {Summoning:1440}.
description.en:
{%FightTurnEndedMonsters}\v
Summons a\_monster.\vSummons one extra per game turn.
<rem>Limit: {value:m} {m, plural, one[monster] other[monsters]} maximum.</rem>
\---
Then {PMvalue:pm,+} to monsters that have {ATvalue:seuil} or more. Does not affect {Summoning:1440}.
description.es:
{%FightTurnEndedMonsters}\v
Invoca un\_monstruo.\vInvoca uno adicional por turno de juego.
<rem>Limitado a {value:m} monstruos como máximo.</rem>
\---
Luego {PMvalue:pm,+} a los monstruos que tienen {ATvalue:seuil} o más, no afecta a {Summoning:1440}.
description.de:
{%FightTurnEndedMonsters}\v
Beschwört ein\_Monster.\vBeschwört ein zusätzliches pro Runde.
<rem>Begrenzt auf max. {value:m}\_Monster.</rem>
\---
Anschließend {PMvalue:pm,+} für Monster, die mind. {ATvalue:seuil} haben, gilt allerdings nicht für {Summoning:1440}.
description.pt:
{%FightTurnEndedMonsters}\v
Invoca um\_monstro.\vInvoca um monstro adicional por turno de jogo.
<rem>Limite de {value:m} monstros no máximo.</rem>
\---
Depois, {PMvalue:pm,+} aos monstros que tiverem {ATvalue:seuil} ou mais. Não afeta {Summoning:1440}.
